page.title: 01SUMMARY OF AREA
page.content: This Domesday Block covers the area to the South - East of St.Andrews, a holiday resort on the East coast of Scotland in the Kingdom of Fife, and a town famous for its golf courses, for its Unversity and above all as the home of the Royal and Ancient Golf Club. The land area of the block is mainly rural, crossed by the coastal road running from St. Andrews to Crail. The influence of the town of St. Andrews is seen in the North-East corner of the block with the extensive Kinkell Braes Caravan Park.
